TextBlock.Text: I don't understand, how could this happen? The recording... did the <color=purple>Bramble</color> do this? Was it lured in by the heat of the star, thinking that it could feed on it?
Everyone... I counted them, and everyone's gone. My people, the Nomai, I'm the only one that was spared. Even Lioloma, she still has my poem...
The buildings on <color=orange>Magma's Recursion</color> were only ruins. Why were they ruins? How long has it been? I thought that I was only gone for a few minutes.
Is this my fault? Did I not come back fast enough? Should I never have brought the Nomai to us? I know everyone was nervous about newcomers, but I was so excited to see something, someone new.
I don't understand. Please, please, I can't be the only one left! I can't be alone.
I don't want to be alone.
